raw_comment:
The skewed college admissions. 
The graph depicts the components that affect the likelihood of acceptance into an elite college. A legacy with income in the 0.1 percentile is seven times more likely to get into elite colleges. This graph proves that legacy and income play a role in the college admissions process. I wonder if the reason income plays a role is so universities do not have to grant aid to students who need it. This applied to my community as I am a senior in the college admissions process. I do not have a legacy, being an immigrant.
ace_sentences: The graph depicts components that affect the likelihood of acceptance into an elite college.
A legacy with an income in the 0.1 percentile is seven times more likely to be accepted into an elite college than a non-legacy.
The graph shows that legacy plays a role in the college admissions process.
The graph shows that income plays a role in the college admissions process.
I wonder if universities use income in admissions so that universities do not have to grant financial aid to students who need financial aid.
This situation applies to my community.
I am a senior in the college admissions process.
I do not have a legacy.
